description: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.[Form guilds]Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds![Battlegrounds in its original form]Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.[Realistic and smooth graphics]Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.[Contact us]Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN
descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

[Form guilds]
Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds!

[Battlegrounds in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.

[Contact us]
Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN
developerAddress: 1 FUSIONOPOLIS PLACE, 17-10, GALAXIS, Singapore
recentChanges: 2. Ranked mode is now available for those of you who are more competitive. Exclusive season rewards await!
Swim across to the new Sentosa Island, or you could just hide in the sea.
1. Major graphic improvements to make gameplay look and feel more realistic.
summary: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game on mobile.
title: Garena Free Fire

comments: Great potential, but there needs to be a way to earn free gems for the abundance of chest I have... Also there needs to be time to clean up the map once The main objective is completed and definently more chalice for chances to complete levels, I only have a certain amount of time to play so I need to fit it into my time, not yours.... Ok game but not a great game for the players, micro-transaction heavy and very little chances to complete the levels.

Really enjoy the game. Relaxing and addicting. However, i dont like the large amounts of lock chests taking up my camp space. I think the lock chests are too much of a push to get me to buy crystals. Chances of getting crystals seem slim and with the small amount of space available for other things, this is a down side for me. If i have to pay to open chests that i have been rewarded, why play? That might be  something that causes me to quit the game before too long.

When I first downloaded this game it was fun...now, all the dragons only have a stamina of 1 and now you need trophies to play levels. These trophies take f-o-r-e-v-e-r to accumulate. These things have made the game drag on way too long. And accomplishing any thing may also cost actual money now. I have read other reviews about the money system of this game and I will not be throwing my money down this drain.

Loved this game at the start. But since last update it has crashed on me several times. Today alone it has crashed on me 3 times. I lost all my camp progress each time and had to start again and of course each time is different because it is impossible to duplicate. Today I also lost my dragon gems and dragons I had created prior to crashes. There fore I lost my money spent. I also lost my daily chest which  contained 2 life trees and a super egg fragment.  I am very upset and dissatisfied now and regret spending money on this game that I loved prior to all the crashes.

Please remove The Challenges. The timer runs out too early on all of the challenges, all the way up to challenge 20. I have all the standard levels finished. I have been waiting for you to make new standard levels. The timer is cheating people in your challenges. There is no way they can be completed. I am not buying 50 gems to add 2 minutes. That's a waste of my money.

The game is great but customer service is non- existent. I bought the 30 day gem special that was supposed to come with an egg and fountain. Got the gems (so far)but not the extra items. Tried contacting customer support several times but following their M.O., they never respond.
description: Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching! In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:== Match Objects ==• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.== Tricky Puzzles ==• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
recentChanges: - NEW LEVELS! 11 New Levels in Cloud Land! This includes new cloud puzzles: find the right object to clear the clouds!
- Adjusted the Daily Chest to respawn after 23 hours instead of 24 hours, to help alleviate scheduling creep a bit.
- Fixed the case where the camera could fly off in the opposite direction when panning, especially when playing in large levels or a bustling camp.
summary: Match everything in your world to create life and heal the land!
title: Merge Dragons!

comments: Good game. I love the fact you can get premium crystals or gems easily and on a regular basis.  Only thing I don't like is the golden cup shots or whatever they are called. Make an option to use those gems for shots instead of real cash would be nice but still earned 5 stars. Samsung galaxy note 8

I think everything is fantastic about the game, but after this last update. The loading time is 20x slower if it loads at all. Galaxy phone. I can't leave message with development so this is the best I can do about that. But I love the game and this wouldn't change my activity amount at all. Keep up the great work development and look forward to new games in the future.

Best game i played ever. But new update have some bugs like if we going to play with friends it take too much time for loading nd mostly notification pop up that there is an error your coins refunded in your account. Kindly resolve this issue. Except this best game 👍

So I have no idea why I am always at a club disadvantage. My driver is level 5 and always vs a person with level 7 or 8. Why do I never go against level 3 drivers. Always vs higher clubs! ALL THE TIME! you might as well give them the win. Losing me as a customer because there is something very lopsided.

Game sucks donkey *****. You play maybe 10 beginner holes and get chests that open in 12 seconds. THEN you play a normal hole and get a chest that doesn't open for 4hrs. You only get four chest slots so that means you can only win four holes then you have to wait 4hrs (or 8 or 12hrs depending on the chest you choose to open) before you can get anything for winning a hole. In two days, I haven't even played 18 holes. Guess you gotta have money if you wanna play. Thought I trusted the "Editors Choice" games, guess not.

Love the game, but its not perfect. You could make the textures better and add more detail in each level bc right now they look empty. Also matchmaking is garbadge, and I get matched against people with much higher trophy counts and far better clubs... Fix this bs please.
description: The sun is shining, it’s time to play the real-time multiplayer game everybody’s talking about!Game of the Year 2018 - Mobile Game AwardsGame of the Year  - TIGA Awards Play on beautiful courses against players around the world in real-time as you compete in tournaments, 1v1 games and challenge your Facebook friends! Upgrade your clubs and unlock tours as you master your golf skills in the quest to be the Golf Clash king!   - Quick-fire 1v1 real-time gameplay.  - Revolutionary shot system that’s easy to learn but difficult to master.  - Thousands of live players online waiting to be challenged.  - Progress through more advanced tours as you “raise the stakes”.  - Earn promotion in weekly leagues to win club card bonuses.  - Compete against your friends via Facebook to earn the bragging rights.  - Unlock chests as you discover and upgrade to premium clubs and balls.  - Save and share replays of your jaw-dropping shots.  - Banter your opponents with chat and emoji during the match!  - Advance through challenging courses and weather conditions.Emoji icons supplied by EmojiOne

comments: Its a super fun game and I liked it. But for some reason every 5 seconds an internet browser would pop up saying I had a virus on my phone. Checked my phone but nothing. It never did this with any other app even before downloading this. Only ever happened when playing the game.

I actually like the game, but I got all the guys in 3 days.... Now what? There are no upgrades or any other options to use the money on. Also the same thing is happening as others said, where the browser keeps popping up saying there is a virus. Pretty annoying

Fun game, very entertaining. Ads pop up too often, it opens my browser saying i have a virus. I cant avoid it and it happens very often. Im only keeping the app bc i hope the next update fixes this issue. Other than the stupid pop up its a great game and i enjoy it. Please fix it so i dont have to uninstall.

I wanted to enjoy this game. The advertisements randomly open chrome browser windows with a fake virus scan saying "your device is infected." Its ironic in that the software that you're prompted to download is terrible adware that an actual scanner might flag.  It's quite persistent too, happening only after I installed this. 30 second video ads midgsme and adbars that just so happen to pop up and hover where you have to click in-game.

I love the game as a whole, and I just barely redownloaded it and it saved my progress, but I can't even get through one whole throw without it opening up chrome with a fake survey or whatever. I'm not joking, it's really bad. That's why I can't give this a good rating. I understand the need for ads in a free game, but for whatever reason, mine is nothing but ads.

I did not play this game for a long time. I download it and I only played it for maybe 2 hours. I tried to play, but when I  was in the middle of the game and it froze and sent me back to my home screen. The controls I like. This is not the greatest game I have seen, but It's ok😐😐😞😞

comments: I like it.   The fish are friendly and encouraging.  I use the game to help me keep calm and relax.  Please consider allowing us to select another of one of the earlier aquariums when we get to the point where we are waiting for new aquariums to be developed and have finished everything.  I'd like a place to put new fish and decorations, but none of the old fish want to be sold.  They are still my favorite friends.  The game uses a lot of memory, and I had to uninstall it from my tablet because it kept making it crash.  Works on my phone, but it's still a lot of memory.

Love this game!! I love the challenge with completing levels. There's days I can't get enough of this game. I play every day. I love decorating my tanks. I love when I get infinite time, but It would be nice if we had control over when to use it or the time would stop and be saved for when we return. Sometimes 6 hours is impossible to sit there and just play. One thing that would be nice is if we didn't have to wait 30 mins for a life to renew and could have more friends to  receive more lives and got to use the diamonds we earned amd not be stored in a bank to buy. Other than that I cant complain😉 best game out there and I highly recommend it to all ages.

It's a great game. I play it with my daughter on our freetime it's quite addictive. Its great that you get rewards if you have to watch the movies. The only thing i would change is the reloding of the lives. Half an hour for one life is too long. Every so often you get a few free hours, but you need to have free time to play.I love the fact that we can play using my phone sideways (landscape ) as I have a problem with my wrist. I highly recommend it!

Fishdom is a fun game.  The puzzles are challenging. I would love to see a change to the gifts we can give our neighbors . Such as, the lightening, or fireworks, or an ornament for their aquarium. I would also like to see the diamonds we earn to be available, not stuck in a bank, to be paid for.  Limits could be put on it, of course, but the free one here and there only help once in any puzzle sequence.   Overall, though, its a nice game.

I love this game I just wish it was more interactive with the fish in one's tank. Like when you pet them little hearts appear and one can earn happiness points with so many touches. I also wish that one could still earn something for previous tanks. I have no real reason to visit my first and second tank. I don't earn anything for more decorations and it doesn't get dirty and the fish don't get hungry. I feel bad for them, but I focus on my current tanks.

Got a new tablet for Xmas.   Had game on sd card. Wouldn't transfer to new tablet.  Was on level 105.  Have to start all over again! TORTURE lol. Other games I would just stop but not this one.  I love It!  EDIT...STILL LOVE THIS GAME.  Highly reccommend it!  Some levels are SO difficult but still loving this game Oct 9/17.  DEC 2017.  Still adore this game.  Now my husband plays too.  Best game EVER!
description: Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Fishdom, an all-new free game! Try challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely talking fish. Feed them, play with them, and watch them interact with each other. Hey, your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure! Features:● Unique gameplay: swap and match pieces, design and decorate aquariums, play with and take care of fish—all in one puzzle game!● Play hundreds of challenging and fun match-3 levels● Compete with other players to develop your aquarium even faster● Explore an exciting aquatic world with funny talking 3D fish that each have their own personality● Liven up fish tanks with breathtaking underwater decor● Grab your scuba mask and enjoy amazing aquarium graphics● It’s a blast for everyone: share your Fishdom mania with your Facebook friends!● No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play Please note that Fishdom is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Fishdom? Learn more: Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FishdomOfficial Questions? Contact our tech support at fishdom@playrix.com

description: Play against 30 million opponents!Wordfeud is a multiplayer puzzle game where you can challenge friends and random opponents and play in up to 30 separate games simultaneously!Create and place words on the 15 by 15 tile board and earn points for creativity and placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word tiles.Search for friends to play against or allow Wordfeud to match you up with an opponent. Even chat with them - smack talk or praise - it's your choice!Tired of the same standard board each game? Choose the option to randomize the board and change up where the DL, TL, DW, TW tiles are placed - giving the classic game a new twist!Features:- Choose to play with friends or be matched up against random opponents- Play in 30 simultaneous games!- Random board option to mix up the DL, DW, TL, TW tiles- Push notifications informing you of opponent's latest move- Uses English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Finnish dictionaries- Chat with your opponentsFor more information on Wordfeud, visit us at Wordfeud.com and follow on Twitter @wordfeud. Also check out the Facebook fan page at http://www.facebook.com/WordfeudGame
descriptionHTML:
Play against 30 million opponents!

Wordfeud is a multiplayer puzzle game where you can challenge friends and random opponents and play in up to 30 separate games simultaneously!

Create and place words on the 15 by 15 tile board and earn points for creativity and placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word tiles.

Search for friends to play against or allow Wordfeud to match you up with an opponent. Even chat with them - smack talk or praise - it's your choice!

Tired of the same standard board each game? Choose the option to randomize the board and change up where the DL, TL, DW, TW tiles are placed - giving the classic game a new twist!

Features:
- Choose to play with friends or be matched up against random opponents
- Play in 30 simultaneous games!
- Random board option to mix up the DL, DW, TL, TW tiles
- Push notifications informing you of opponent's latest move
- Uses English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Finnish dictionaries
- Chat with your opponents

For more information on Wordfeud, visit us at Wordfeud.com and follow on Twitter @wordfeud. Also check out the Facebook fan page at http://www.facebook.com/WordfeudGame
developerAddress:
Cicilieveien 3 D
7020 Trondheim
Norway
recentChanges: * Wordfeud will now use your preferred font size (from the Android settings)
* Removed setting "Badge App Icon" from Samsung devices running Android 8, as Wordfeud cannot control this
summary: A fun multiplayer word game. Who can make the highest scoring words?
title: Wordfeud FREE

My only complaint is that the 'play online' option is very laggy, and if you fix it would be much appreciated. Thanks for a great game, from sinéad, ella, lauren, mollie, shane and ollie 😊😊

This is better than the browser version for multiple reasons. 1) It doesn't lag as much. I played a few rounds a noticed a little bit of lag, but it's better than the browser version.  2) You can play against AI if you don't want to play against people. I like this because I actually had a chance to win and was able to kill some. 3) You can create your own custom skin, which is awesome. All of this is free as well. I love this version of Slither.io.

Playing this game is total fun. But It would be more Awesome if there will be some sounds & a pause button maybe. One more thing, somebody tell me how to BOOST the Slither because everyone is boosting except me😭😌😶🙄😓😑😫🙃

The controlls are pretty bad considering how simple they are.  The lag is unbearable. Fix those and you've got a 5star game all day. Simple fun pick up and put down time killer. In fact the lag is such an issue however, the game is getting uninstalled. You can't play a reaction based game when the lag has you 6 seconds behind whats going on.
description: Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!

The theme is good. The balance seems reasonable. My only suggestion is making to character limit for name changes bigger for the dwellers/subjects. Only thing I can constructively suggest. Or be able to type first and last name.

I mean in a game if you defeated the boss those are supposed to be yours without paying, I can accept paying for 1 dollar but the second boss requires me to purchase it for almost $3 I already paid for premium I don't want to pay for other things. Please make the drops free for premium members or have them cheap or totally free, or else after my premium I'll quit this game.

description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
developerAddress: Barbara Strozzilaan 201, 1083 HN in Amsterdam
recentChanges: - We are preparing Hustle Castle for a number of major updates that will include: Clan Battles, Item Enchantment, Co-op Battles, and some other new features.
- Expanded statistics at the end of a battle
- Ability to show items in the in-game chat
summary: Your castle, your rules!
title: Hustle Castle: Fantasy Kingdom

comments: Is this game for You? Do you enjoy spending most of the game watching ads? Do you enjoy games that make it impossible to play without spending real money? Do you enjoy being grabbed by the crotch so hard you change genders?  If you answered yes or no to any of these then no this game is not for you. It's nothing but a crappy game designed to rake in as much money as possible, rather than making something fun. Forced to watch 30 second ads after each round. Forced to use the currency you earn when you don't want too. Enemy power will suddenly jump up 10 fold making spells and goldimpossible to gain without watching an addition 30 second ad. Even if you win and get the key you are forced to watch a 30 sec ad to unlock as if you didn't get a key.

Good little time waster, simple classic gameplay but puts its own unique twist on it.   Side note: I clearly played this game more than they thought anyone would as I have started getting repeated designs when I upgrade my spells xD

It stopped working on my One plus! Help! I was excited about the side games! *********************************** Excellent, addictive fun. I reached shield 135 (level 1154) and it doesn't level up any more. Gutted! Still a great game but so sad I can't progress any more. No reason why really! Incidentally, good for helping kids with Mathematics.

All in all it is a really great game there are very few ads, its fun, the graphics are crisp. Its amazing except for one thing. On one of the levels all of the monsters have exactly 666 health and im not religious or anything but I'm pretty sure that if some one who is religious see's that, well lets just say that it might not be good for the company, so I suggest you fix this.  Thanks.

Concept and gameplay is ok, but, like others have said, there are way too many ads. Also the special spells you can unlock are given to you at random. Have a aituation that drill would be great for? Too bad take explosion.

Fun game but takes forever to get gold to upgrade. The cost to pay for the gems to buy so you can buy gold is really expensive. Not much dynamic to the game. Same stuff on each level just takes longer to bet enemies cause of higher HP.
description: Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.

The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.

Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.

comments: Awesome Game!! Really I like this game. I dont even have words to describe it. Totally Fantastic... Whatever you say, this is totally cool. But I have a request...please add a column of legendary bikes. Like there is Common, Rares, Epics, and Specials , there should be a column of legendary. Waiting eagerly for the next update. Thanks a lot of making this fabulous game. And I would also like to appreciate the colours and graphics of this game. Thanks to the team for making this game. I advice this game to those who are looking for cool new games. Please install it and have FUN!!!! Dont just look at the pics, install and you'll be amazed.

Unless you have 16 hrs a day to put into this game to learn the track you will never have a very high score. Sometimes your vehicle doesnt respond the same as other runs also you may land on your tail and survive and the next time you die its up and down with the control if you keep going or die. And sometimes it tries to flip when you try to take off resulting in a quick death

Great looking game, and good idea. I give it 4 stars because the tracks are not consistent. One time an obstical will work and the next run you hit an invisible bump and die. Also, a lot of the time it won't register your flips. These aren't huge bugs but considering the gameplay is based entirely upon these two premises, it makes the experience frustrating.

Would and will give 5 star. But would like to see a gem counter. It gets rather tough keeping count.  Also I noticed sometimes that when come across the areas that have the 4-5 flat spiked walls that you have to time just right. When I die and revive they all seem to sync up together making it impossible to go under. I'll try and screenshot it next time. All in all great job and awesome game. Maybe a custom map feature for future. Possibly added to the no ads fee. Would be worth it then.

Way much room to improve                                 So first you could get more bikes in there and add more levels and make the resolution better like 1080 or something add more achievements and more of those levels that you get when you are just playing that game outside of the levels. But other wise great stuff great stuff keep it up. Also some missions are impossible, unless as someone else's comment said you play 16 hours a day

This game is my favorite game ever. The graphics are amazing, the controls are great. I can't seem to find anything wrong with this game. Me and my brother love playing it. I also like that it is available on Google Play Store and the Appstore on iPhones. My old phone was an iPhone, and when I got my new phone I was worried that I wouldn't be able to play it, but thanks to Ketchapp and Google Play Store, I can still play it!! Also, I would like to suggest that you add a feature that allows you to create your own level, but it's not something you have to add, it's just something I think would make the game absolutely perfect for me. Then again, you may already have that feature and I haven't seen it/gotten to it yet. Anyway, it's an amazing game, and I hope Ketchapp keeps making amazing games like this!!! (BTW, Ketchapp games are my absolute FAV.) Thank you!! 🚘😊🚘

comments: A great app to download. Great format and graphics. Lots of fun and challenging. Rated everything 5 star other than gameplay. It's good but not great due to the water hazard or out of bounds shots.  Players can hit into the water yet still finish on par. Water hazard should automatically be 2 shots. If this gets changed it would be 5 star no doubt and best golf app.  Single mode would be fantastic to practise

OK I really love this game but all if a sudden I can't play it anymore. I try to set up a match and it just hangs in the loading screen then boots me to the main menu. I have sent 2 emails to support within almost a week and more than 48 hours apart. I have not received any responses. Other than that it is a great game and for the time I was able to play I enjoyed it very much and hope to receive assistance in this matter soon so I can continue to play this wonderful game.

I had to change my rating for this game because I seriously believe it is rigged for me to stop advancing. Everything was great until I made it to pro level and now I'm noticing that whenever I am tied with another player with gems, an extra gem magically appears in the hole making me lose that round. How is it possible that I made it to pro level winning a good percentage of games and now I have played at least 50 rounds on level 3 and can't win a single one?

To many play just to attack your ball after you hit. Regardless if they don't play well they win. A bit eh. The way it's done barely allows you to win. I agree with many others reviews. Something fishy about the scoring system and who you are placed against. Won't keep long if it continues. Could be awesome if it wasn't unfair. O.o

This game is ok at best. More about luck then skill. Fun and addictive, yes at times. Ive collected all the trophies from 3 of the maps and was on a roll. Then out of nowhere a 15 game lose streak. You will get to the point past anger. There are a lot of pretty good/lucky players from around the world.

Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.  EDIT: Game froze on a Pixel XL, cost me lots of coins! Not happy.

comments: Horrendously intrusive advertising I play this game regularly, and enjoy the gameplay. However, the advertising is a horrible and annoying part of the app, and probably borderlining app guidelines. When the advertisement is on between rounds, they block your entire UI, and there's nothing you can do to shut it down. They will frequently stream video, which can easily consume your entire allowed data from your telephone company. This is NOT how you should provide games, free or not.
Storage hog The app can't be moved from the internal (phone) memory to the external (SD-card) memory. This is a major issue with an app of this size.
Krasj-bug fikset Bug der den krasjer ofte er fikset i 1.4.0. Kjempebra! Ellers er det et godt utvalg av spørsmål. Men mye om vin på kategori "mat og drikke".
Ikke premium fra iOS Hadde premium på iPhone, men da jeg byttet til Android har jeg ikke lenger premium.. ikke bra
Grei app men; Tar reklamen for langt ; kjøp fullversjonen eller dø på innsiden
Different Q's Gives different questions to each of us, but shows up as if we've been asked the same

comments: I like the game its fun and engaging but the premium choices cost a lot of diamonds and you don't get a lot opportunity to earn them. 12- 18 diamonds for more then a couple  choices in a story to make interesting choices that wouldmake the storys better but you only earn 1 diamond a chapter witch you have to wait an hour or more to unlock or buy keys.  So you pretty much have to spend real money for this game to really enjoy it. Ill be deleting this app not worth my time.

While the game is enjoyable and the stories are intriguing, it is way too expensive to make certain choices. There is absolutely no need for choices to cost 20 or 25 diamonds when you only get 1 diamond for each chapter completed.  This game is in no way good enough to warrant spending real money on it, especially considering the ridiculously high prices of making certain choices which would require making a purchase in every single chapter.

The game is great. Great graphics, nice music, perfectly cued entrees  for new characters, amazing story line.... But they don't give you enough keys or diamonds. I mean, y s its understandable that the chapters are long but 2hrs for a recharge on keys? Really? Either make the waiting time shorter, give us more, or both. Now as for the diamonds, they give you 25 of them. But each special choices is always way to much. And you never really know when your going to need them for something serious. With that said either give us more keys, lower the cost of the choice, or give us more diamonds per chapter. Not like 2 but 5 or more.

It's a brilliant app, though sometimes I wish there wasn't as many gem choices. I fully considered buying gems until I realised how quickly they'd be used.   My favourite story was It Lives In The Woods, though most of the choices are gem choices. The story itself is fantastic, and I love the diversity of characters.   I had a problem with a story playing up and after a chat with the team was told to restart it. I didn't mind but I didn't get any keys to compensate what I'd already spent (I don't buy them I just wait for then to recharge, but it did mean I had to respend keys on one story because of a issue out of my control)   Overall its a great app and highly playable without spending.

Diamond choices come up way too often for how much they cost and how little you get. The keys have an unreasonably long cooldown to get them. Options like watching ads to get diamonds would be a great option, especially seeings how you have that option in HSS and HU:RS. All that aside its a good game. Lots of the stories are enjoyable and its visually pleasing.

Great graphics and great stories. Right now they have like 30 "books", so there are lots of options. I've been playing since 2016 and the app just keeps getting better. Can get a little pricey for the preminum choices, but otherwise it's a fantastic app; very additive and entertaining
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team

comments: This game was absolutely perfect and was very much enjoyable, but now to unlock the full experience you have to pay. One of the reasons I enjoy this game and recommended it to my friends is because it is one of the only games that isn't locked behind a paywall. Overall, I have had countless hours playing this game, and trying to land on everything and return successfully. Instead of the microtransaction, why not institute a merit-based system for unlocking parts?

Very great!  Here are a few suggestion from me to make your game more enjoyable :)  1. Can you please make the earth scale correctly because its diameter is around 12.000 km and moon orbit is around 380.000 km  2. Please make a smaller powerful engine like the 9 engines of the falcon 9  3. Please make a button that is simple to cycle from another rocket to another one to ease the attempt of landing a booster  4. Please add an ocean on the earth for some splashdown  5. The last one. Im a free 2 play player and i cant enjoy a majority of the new update :*(

This game is awsome. Loads of fun. Told my friends about it. Could you add a free sandbox mode and more free parts. Thanks. Keep up the good work. Shouldn't have added micro transactions. It just ruined the game for me. Had to take it from a 5 star to a 3 star. Please bear this comment in mind for future updates. This game was 100% free when i downloaded it in december last year. Since then, you added a new build system, free parts which make the game absolutely amazing, and then you add pay for parts. Thats just buzzkill.

Very fast and simple rocket building and great graphics. I wish there was a sandbox mode with infinite fuel. Also there is no indication for loading screens when you hit the launch button. Somethimes you think you tapped the button and end up sitting there for a minute or two wasting time.  Edit So glad they made a small payment option. Well worth the money and glad to support

Great!  Only thing I miss is the ability to rendezvous and dock with another object.  In a moon landing, you could leave a stage in lunar orbit and pick it up for the outbound burn.  Also, karman line should be 100 km??  Edit:. Great updates.  I have no idea how to use docking to reattach parts that have been undocked though.

Can you please add option to center the map on the rocket/vehicle when being in the map mode? It is difficult to switch between near objects in the current version, since I assume the map is stationary relative to the body in which influence sphere we're in at that moment. Also, a "docking guide" would be cool in some future update
description: This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.• Realistic orbital mechanics• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.Current planets and moons:• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9CVideo tutorials: Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQMoon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
descriptionHTML:
This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!

• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.
• Realistic orbital mechanics
• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.

Current planets and moons:
• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)
• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)
• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)
• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)
• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)
• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)

Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9C

Video tutorials:
Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQ
Moon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8

comments: I Personally would like to have the ability to upgrade stars on heroes easier without spending real money. Get 2 to 3 stars on the characters for free leaves me wanting, and im just not spending money on a game like this. Otherwise it is a fun game. Even though it basically can be a full time job you dont make money on and have to spend money on. So if you dont mind commiting months to barely make it to do the late game stuff amd still have to spend months to progress. This game will be great. This review is for those who play ftp games without actually paying to win.

So it's kinda fun but I'm rating it low based on the cost of purchasing character shards versus how many you get. I tested it out and purchased a ton of purple diamond things and purchased character shards that gives between 5 and 330. Out of 7 purchases at 1299 each, I got a total of 41 shards. So for roughly 9100 diamonds, I get 41 shards. You do the math. This game apparently enjoys taking your money. I've mentioned this to the developers with no reply. DC Legends knows what they're doing when it comes to purchases of character shards. At least they make it easier

Very addictive. I started playing casually, and 4 weeks later I find myself checking it all the time. It's best played with at least a minor investment, but reasonably ftp...if you got patience.  Add: it's been six months, and I'm still hammering away at it. It has a huge base of fans,and I've only needed customer support once (and they handled my issue very well and quickly).  Still a bit grind-y, but great little bit of clicky gaming.

This game hooked me up. The community it is very helpfull and growing evryday.Check youtube videos befor you start playing this game because is a griding game and you will need patiance and a good guidance at the start. It is not p2w you can play it as a f2p but you will need patiance so dont worry about money...in this game money will only save you time not exclusive content. 5* from me this is for sure the best mobile game ever. May the force be with you.

The game is fun enough but to sync it with your Google account to have to give your phone and all its abilities to EA. Why is there a need for the game to access my photos and make and answer calls? How 'bout I play a game on my phone with cool light sabers and fun music and when I need to make a call I'll stop for a bit. Just let people play and EA can make bank with their microtransactions. GTFO of people's personal info.

The game is a lot of fun if you are willing to put A LOT of time into grinding things out. They have made huge changes for just quality of life things, but they have kept the core game the same. Grind, grind, grind, grind, and grind some more. You can get everything in the game just by playing it. No need to pay anything. However it would be a lot easier if you could spend 1000$ on the game every couple weeks lol.
description: “Visually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars™ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.” – USA Today"The best Star Wars™ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." – GamezeboLive your Star Wars™ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, Rogue One™: A Star Wars™ Story and Star Wars™: The Last Jedi™. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAMRebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It’s your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars™ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXYDefeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes’ abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONSMake smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker’s Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin’s Reckless Assault, and others.ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLESCollect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDSLead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comGame EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
descriptionHTML:
“Visually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars™ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.” – USA Today

"The best Star Wars™ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." – Gamezebo

Live your Star Wars™ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, Rogue One™: A Star Wars™ Story and Star Wars™: The Last Jedi™. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAM
Rebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It’s your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars™ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!

BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXY
Defeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes’ abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.

PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker’s Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin’s Reckless Assault, and others.

ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLES
Collect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!

RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDS
Lead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.

Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.com

Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/

Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges: Get excited – everything you love just got better! Now you can:
• Earn the right to multi-sim Galactic War and Ship Challenges
• Receive bonus banners based on combat performance in Territory Wars
• View which Territory War defensive squads were most successful
• Search for units by name when selecting your squad
• Set inactive units as favorites and search favorites easier
• Link accounts to play between Android and iOS devices
summary: Collect and battle with iconic heroes to become the top hologamer in the galaxy!
title: Star Wars™: Galaxy of Heroes

description: Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech? Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
descriptionHTML:
Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.

The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.

As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.

The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.
Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.

This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!

PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
developerAddress: Unit 04,7/F,Bright Way Tower, No.33 Mong Kok Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong

description: Join more than 30 million brainiacs and try WordBrain - Brain training at its BEST! This is a word puzzle for true word geniuses! It starts out very easy but gets challenging quickly. Exercise your brain and find hidden words, slide your finger over them, and see the letters collapse. Do it all in the correct order and you will be able to clear the grid. As you get stuck on a level, which you probably will, remember that there are no unsolvable levels. So think carefully before each swipe and conquer the ultimate word challenge while keeping your brain in shape! WordBrain is available in 15 languages with 700 levels per language, so even the smartest word game enthusiasts will have a real challenge to complete this game. In fact, only very few have!---WordBrain has been lovingly created by MAG Interactive, where we take fun seriously.Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like Ruzzle,Wordalot or WordBrain 2!We really value your feedback, go to https://www.facebook.com/wordbraingame and say what's on your mind!More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.comGood Times!

comments: I felt like this be could have so much potential! I thought that the different colours gave you the ability to collect more balls so not really sure what the point of the game is... no way to won or lose ... just click ... I like things with skill... I can handle the ads and would even pay to remove ads if the game have a point.. a purpose a win/lose sort of deal but it's not I don't think I will be keeping this game .. unless they add a little skill to it

This isn't a game. You just hold a button until it disappears and then hold another button... Really. And then there is an option to just have the buttons automatically hold themselves. Then the next level happens and there are new colors, but nothing else is different. Maybe good to keep your baby busy but I wouldn't condone that sort of thing

It's decent. I like the sounds it makes, and the colours look nice too. The forced ads I can't skip after 5 seconds is the annoying part. I get that you need ads, but come on man. I buy 3 upgrades and have to watch a full minute ad. It's like an ad simulator. Honestly if I wanted to play with balls, and watch ads I'd play with my own balls, and throw some ads on YouTube(this part is mostly for humour). Just so you know I'm not salty, annoyed yes, but not salty.

I like the game as it's one when you don't want to think but want to do something. It's very easy. However you watch more ads than you do play the game. So annoying I had to sit through a 1 minute cat chat advert without being able to skip it. Then a 10 second level then another 50 second unskipable ad so annoying

Ads are non skipable which is awful. Skippable ads are ones that pop up that you don't want usually. The full ads like on this game are only usually shown when you are getting a upgrade to a boost or something free etc. Terrible design as you can't win either

I love a stupid game, I really do, not everything has to be top tier strategy or reflex based or whatever  However this is the most boring clicker game ever. At least normal clickers have a theme or SOMETHING to pretend you're doing... Anything at all. Here, you don't even have that. No context, no theme, not even a change of shape or whatever  It's sad gaming has gone this low

comments: It's nice game - very nice graphic, very smooth moving - it would be 5 stars. BUT - I payed for levels 13 and 14 , and the game does not allow me to play in random order - it's not possible to play no. 23 without finishing all numbers before. If you are stuck in some number, you cannot go to another one - you MUST BUY hint!!! It means - you PAID for the game, but you MUST PAY again for hint - or you are blocked in PAID  game. It's just not fair.

A lot of Numberlink programs have "fake" puzzles - they have multiple solutions unless additional non-standard "rules" are followed... which are NEVER fun. This app doesn't do that. These are the real deal, and are VERY satisfying to solve. The price is extremely low for the quantity and quality on offer; I highly recommend this game.

I loved flow free from a young age. I've played until 9×9 pack but when I reached a certain level,  the game stopped working after that and I've tried over and over again to go in but the game just keeps bring me back to the home screen and keeps stopping. Please fix it. I really want to play the remaining levels and packs

Great game. Keep coming back to it. I find it relaxing solving the puzzles, though it has become super easy! All versions are great. All in all, awesome job! One of my favourites, and works in any situation. Quick break at work, something productive ? Play. Something to do before sleep? Play. Got a few extra mins? Play! Wanna challenge yourself on timed? Play! Haha.

The best, the OG, the original puzzle time-passer! (second only to Tetris) I love this game, I've been playing it for years! The original starts to get boring after awhile, but with all the different variations they come out with, it never gets old. A very fresh experience with one of the recent updates, feels much more refined when compared to the one I used to play.

Simple yet clever, Free Flow is about connecting brightly colored dots together without crossing the lines. With an abundance of board shape, size, variety, and difficulty, there's something in free play to challenge nearly everybody. Those who find even the largest puzzles too easy may alternatively challenge themselves in time trials to finish the boards as quickly as possible.
description: Flow Free® is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow®. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Flow Free. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Flow Free gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Flow Free a try, and experience "mind like water"!Flow Free features:★ Over 2,000 free puzzles★ Free Play and Time Trial modes★ Clean, colorful graphics★ Fun sound effectsSpecial thanks to Noodlecake Studios, creators of Super Stickman Golf, for their work on Flow Free!Enjoy.

comments: Great game the reason of why the one star is no matter what if you delete the app or get a new phone it doesn't save. Not to your Facebook account, or Google play game and has problems with it's server. Why any one would spend money on this game until they could at least save stuff is beyond me.

MY STORY OF HUNGRY SHARK  I've been playing hungry Shri since years and I reached my tiger shark.... suddenly it got updated and I lost all my progress and returned to the first level of reef shark...I was so disappointed and uninstalled the game after a few months I reinstalled it and while playing I saw the cloud save and clicked it.....I WAS SO HAPPY THAT I COULD RETURN TO MY PROGRESS....I enjoy playing it and I love the new background and updates  Best wishes- A hungry shark fan

! GOOD !, Arcade style eat'em up game. Feels ALOT like "Echo The Dolphin". Except ur a badass shark! The ONLY hold backs is the controls, but u really can't do much about that problem unless u actually had physical/analog joysticks built n2 ur phone.?. The basic control problems u have w/ ne downloadable games.
Addictive, played for hours at a friends house until 3 in the morning. Got it for myself. Gems are costly, but save up and you can get the baby on the last shark. Then get hungry shark world.

This game was awesome but sometimes I don't like it when my Shark freezes up and who came up with all these sharks? It is a fun game but why are there pressure limits sometimes I don't like it but this game is it for teens it's for everyone it's really fun and well sometimes I don't like it when it takes me a long time to get money for a shark

Love the game but in the last couple days, I'll get into a warp and it'll freeze completely on me. And It truly disappoints me because I could've had so many coins by now. I cannot play the game at all with it not freezing and making me start over.. I don't know if it's a virus or what but I wish it would get fixed.

comments: I will consider rating the game five stars if you can add new levels and lines, but the "hearts" feature forces me to watch ads, even though I paid to remove ads. I will give the game five stars if you gracefully remove the "hearts" feature. I'm asking CM a question: "Will you please change the game back to the original way we played it? And add new levels? 'The Easter' would be creative, and the diamonds can be eggs. How about an Easter Bunny line? I like all the new levels, and the new lines we can unlock. Can you add more remixes to the levels? There are only 3 existing remixes, if CM had forgotten."

I originally had it as 5 stars, but I noticed the longer that I've had the game, the more bugs I'm starting to see. Sometimes the music won't line up with the levels, which is the point of the game, and other times the game won't register my touch and will screw up my progress. If this gets fixed that would be great, and I'd move the rating back to 5 stars!

I really wish you guys didn't update it. It truthfully bugs me that I can't listen to the full song on the menu anymore. The songs are absolutely amazing and the game is very addictive. I hope you will update the game again so that we can just sit and listen to these master pieces if we wanted. Thanks for an awesome game!

Amazing game... Loved it...😍 The tunes are AWESOME!!!  And Bryan swag zone At first even I thought that But... It is a maze so it'll obviously be twisted... (No Hate) It is actually that you should click maybe after the third or fourth turn to get it right... Even I took time to understand that So it's okay 😊

The game starts off really strongly and the concept is unique and the music is fabulous.. but later on things get so progressively difficult it makes flappy bird look like a piece of cake... And in the later on levels there's not much sync between the music and the cube it's really hard to play... I enjoyed it initially but now I'm just going to uninstall it...

This is by far my favourite mobile game to date. Loads of fun and not covered with ads like every other game out there (while there is a few this one isn't as bad). My only complaint is the new continuation thing. That wasn't there but now it's forced me to watch ads even though I played to remove ads.

descriptionHTML:
Dancing Line combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better.

Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.

Game rules:
Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.

Game features:
1. Original background music
2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories
3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap

If nothing else its a matter of principle. You punish me by taking everything ive bought and earned, ill punish you by never giving you another dime and i will let everyone i know who plays or asks about any of your games ro stay away.

EDIT: Update on 3/22/18 fixed NOTHING! New levels still locked as well! Worst update in candy crush history. Riddled with bugs. It didn't add new levels like it should have. Unlimited boosters don't appear on level when they should. And boosters are no longer allowed on lower levels. I'm at level 2100 something. I should be able to use boosters when ever I want! And I should be able to have unlimited boosters appear on all levels, not just when they feel like it. Fix and I will give more stars.

Would love to give a better rating, but after the most recent update the game has very bad lag, worse than the usual lag it's always had. Updating this. Was hoping update today would fix the lag. It didn't. Also, adding 2 extra steps in order to replay a stage sucks. You know the old saying; if it ain't broke, don't fix it.

So frustrated with all the candy crush games. I periodically get angry enough to quit for awhile,  but end up back. Why am I upset? I was just in the middle of a rare winning streak and had earned a number of special candies to start games with. I was up to 2 hour on the fish, multi color candy, and the juicy jawbreaker, with 3 hours of life. Suddenly,  i still had the life but all other rewards disappeared. This is far from the first time. I am tired of it. I am removing the king games and I am not coming back this time. I get glitches happen but I have never had any  Indication  that anyone gives a damn. No one makes anything right or even says,  sorry. I'm ok with a game having issues but I am not ok with being treated less than.
I am getting 2 hours unlimited gift daily but i cant use it because after 5 minutes its goes up i dont get it for actual time which it shows pls fix it
